meta.Summary:: Publication of the MAIB report on the investigations into the losses of the small,

title: Triple Investigation Report - Kathryn Jane, Emerald Dawn, Jann Denise II
raw_html:
This report contains details of the investigations into the losses of Kathryn Jane, Emerald Dawn and Jann Denise II resulting in the tragic loss of lives.
It has been decided to combine the results of each investigation to produce a single report to better illustrate MAIB concern over safety in this important sector of the UK's fishing industry.
Please note: scroll to bottom of this page for links to download annexes.
Report name:
Tri-Report
Incident date:
28 July 2004
Category:
Fishing vessels
Summary:
Publication of the MAIB report on the investigations into the losses of the small,

body:
This report contains details of the investigations into the losses of Kathryn Jane, Emerald Dawn and Jann Denise II resulting in the tragic loss of lives.   
It has been decided to combine the results of each investigation to produce a single report to better illustrate MAIB concern over safety in this important sector of the UK's fishing industry.   
Please note: scroll to bottom of this page for links to download annexes.
